text: Michel Terrot (born December 18, 1948 in Lyon) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Rhône department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lyon Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Debout la France politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Michel Terrot
